resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105555</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105555</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206530</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">From Canterbury to Little Rock: The Struggle for Educational Equality for African Americans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Von Canterbury zu Little Rock: Der Kampf 
für pädagogische Gleichheit für afrikanische Amerikaner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De Cantorbéry à peu de roche : La lutte 
pour l'égalité éducative pour les Américains africains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">De Canterbury a pouca rocha: O esforço para
a igualdade educacional para americanos africanos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Da Canterbury a poca roccia: La lotta per 
uguaglianza educativa per gli Americani africani</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από το Καντέρμπουρυ σε λίγο βράχο: Η προσπάθεια
για την εκπαιδευτική ισότητα για αφρικανικούς Αμερικανούς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">De Cantorbery a poca roca: La lucha para la 
igualdad educativa para los americanos africanos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">highlights two historic places and the role each played in the effort toward creating equal educational opportunities for African Americans.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Höhepunkte zwei historische Plätze und die Rolle
jeder spielten in der Bemühung in Richtung zum Erstellen der gleichen
pädagogischen Gelegenheiten für afrikanische Amerikaner.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les points culminants deux endroits historiques et
le rôle chacun ont joué dans l'effort vers créer des occasions 
éducatives égales pour les Américains africains.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os destaques dois lugares historic e o papel cada 
um jogaram no esforço para criar oportunidades educacionais iguais 
para americanos africanos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">punti culminanti due posti storici ed il ruolo 
ciascuno giocato nello sforzo verso la creazione delle occasioni 
educative uguali per gli Americani africani.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυριώτερα σημεία δύο ιστορικές θέσεις και ο ρόλος 
κάθε ένας που παίζεται στην προσπάθεια προς τη δημιουργία των 
ίσων εκπαιδευτικών ευκαιριών για αφρικανικούς Αμερικανούς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los toques de luz dos lugares históricos y el 
papel cada uno jugaron en el esfuerzo hacia crear las oportunidades 
educativas iguales para los americanos africanos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206530</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105555</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/from-canterbury-to-little-rock-the-struggle-for-educational-equality-for-african-americans</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
